titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: STANDARDISED DETECTION RATIO TOTAL - Description

div.p: STANDARDISED DETECTION RATIO TOTAL is derived from INVASIVE BREAST CANCER TOTAL OBSERVED and INVASIVE BREAST CANCER TOTAL EXPECTED.
STANDARDISED DETECTION RATIO TOTAL should only be reported in Table A, B and C1 in the NHS Breast Screening Programme Central Return Data Set (KC62).
